Class.name: ITB.HL7.BO.HTTPXMLOperation
Class.Description: Business Operation that receives an EnsLib.HL7.Message and sends it as HL7 (XML) over HTTP returning received ACK as EnsLib.HL7.Message

Parameter.name: SrcVer
Parameter.Description: Location and Revision of this file in Perforce (Auto-updating)

Property.name: ContentType
Property.Description: Content Type used to send the HTTP content

Method.name: SendHL7
AdapterSendStream
